command_line: export BCFTOOLS_PLUGINS=`which bcftools | sed 's,bin/bcftools,libexec/bcftools,'`;     bgzip -c '/galaxy/server/database/objects/3/3/b/dataset_33bc46d0-3c02-491c-92f4-11a216b2526d.dat' > input.vcf.gz && bcftools index input.vcf.gz &&        bcftools call  -m --prior 0.0011                  --variants-only    --output-type 'v'   --threads ${GALAXY_SLOTS:-4}    input.vcf.gz  > '/galaxy/server/database/objects/3/c/a/dataset_3cab1311-3bbe-432d-a587-ba5bf462031e.dat'

params.sec_input_output: {"format_fields": "", "group_samples": false, "keep_alts": false, "keep_masked_ref": false, "output_tags": null, "skip_variants": null, "variants_only": true}
params.sec_file_format: {"invert_samples": false, "invert_samples_file": false, "ploidy": null, "ploidy_file": null, "regions": {"__current_case__": 0, "regions_src": "__none__"}, "regions_overlap": null, "samples": "", "samples_file": null}

tool_stderr: Note: none of --samples-file, --ploidy or --ploidy-file given, assuming all sites are diploid
